data.text: @SugeWhite76 I get it but she’s 8. She’s already anxious in school because of all this Covid BS. I would never want to create more angst for her. So I’ll keep fighting for her on my end. Could you imagine if it was 1994 and we did that to Dr. Holloway???? 🤣🤣🤣
@Mel_M116 If I were her age I’d rip the mask off in front of the principal & take the unmasked 5 Day Suspension! #Persist
@Mel_M116 The children should have been the first to unmask! Shame on the legislators and agencies who forced the ridiculous narrative that our children would harm adults!
